entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
